sentence.Network_en: An attempt by anti-abortionists to tighten the rules was defeated.
sentence.Network_cn: 反堕胎者所作的加强法规的尝试失败了。

sentence.Network_en: In recent months many conservative politicians have jumped on the anti-immigrant bandwagon.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近几个月，很多保守政客都搭上了“反移民”这班车。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Cramer said the violence by anti-government protestors was reprehensible.
sentence.Network_cn: 克拉默先生说反政府示威者的暴力活动应该受到谴责。

means.word_mean: 1. a religious orientation opposed to Catholicism
